name: Rock Crawler
description:
Can you imagine a car that climbs on hills better and faster than humans? Meet Rock Crawler! This multiplayer game pretty much resembles a real rock crawling: very precise throttle control is required to conquer some peaks. The game utilizes unique soft wheels physics. These big soft wheels allow you to climb on craggy rocks and perform terrific stunts!

- Utilize terrain to perform stunts and make money.
- Overrun your opponents to get more money.
- Buy rockets and pick off opponents to stop them.
- Different progress strategies.
